boardMembers.title: President
boardMembers.name: Kurt Ringo
boardMembers.titleDescription: The HOA President serves as the leader of the board. The main responsibilities of the president include presiding over board meetings and facilitating the decision-making process; signing contacts, checks, and other legal documents; serving as a spokesman for the HOA; and taking charge of the day-to-day operations.

boardMembers.title: Treasurer
boardMembers.name: Maxine Holcomb
boardMembers.titleDescription: The HOA Treasurer oversees the financial operations of the association.  They are in charge of developing the budget, monitoring income and expenses, collecting assessments, issuing payments to vendors, preparing financial reports, and facilitating an audit at the end of a fiscal year.

boardMembers.title: Secretary
boardMembers.name: Caroline Shank
boardMembers.titleDescription: The HOA secretary creates the board meeting agenda (with the president), records the minutes of board meetings, and ensures quorum. They also send notices for board meetings, ensure compliance with the governing documents, maintain bank information and other important documents, and store homeowner and maintenance records.
